content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for at least €1,500 a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, that is quite a lot of money for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. Do you have any flexibility in your pricing?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Yi-Nuo, but the apartment's location and quality are top-notch. I could consider a slight reduction, but not by much. How does €1,450 sound?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding. However, I must be honest with you. As a student, I cannot afford to pay more than €1,250 per month, including all utility bills. I must respectfully decline your offer at €1,450.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Yi-Nuo. €1,250 is too low for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer you're making does not cover the cost of the prime location and quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, I am willing to prove to you that I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I am also willing to sign a two-year lease agreement. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo. However, a two-year lease agreement doesn't significantly affect the rental price. I could consider €1,300, but that's the lowest I can go. The apartment's value is undeniable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration, Mister Schmidt. I understand your position. However, as a student, I cannot afford to pay more than €1,250 per month, including all utility bills. I must respectfully decline your offer at €1,300.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. However, €1,250 is too low for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer you're making does not cover the cost of the prime location and quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mister Schmidt. However, I have found another apartment that meets my budget. Therefore, I don't want to continue the negotiation. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. Thank you for your time as well. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
